reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully and appreciate its classic style and beautiful print. The material receives positive feedback for being lovely and forgiving, with one customer noting it's not flimsy or see-through. They describe it as a perfect "little black dress" that's comfortable and flattering, with one mentioning it's particularly suitable for big women. While some the sizing is spot on, others find i

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fit, very comfortable, flattering dress
items.body: Love this dress, used the seller's sizing chart and it's a perfect fit! Thinking I'll get another one in a different color. The Navy Blue is a beautiful Navy. Other review's were correct, the dress is very flattering, falls nicely. Also does not have a seperate lining, however not see through at all. Great all around dress, suitable for many occasions, and at a great price! Read more
items.author: Melaney M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress
items.body: This dress is very comfortable and fits like a glove. I would totally recommend this dress because it is so cute. It is also well made. Read more
items.author: Kumar Singh

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit and Looks Quality
items.body: Looks very similar to the model—I was impressed! Fabric is rougher on the outside and softer inside. I have a small bust and waist but very full hips. I went with a medium and it fit well. Sleeves feel a little tight. Read more
items.author: boxwood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits wonderfully for busty girls!
items.body: Hey girls, the reviews are correct! This is an amazing dress! It fits so well, and I have a curvy body that isn't easy to fit. Ice sized up. I am 5'10" tall, 150 pounds, and I wear a 36 DD bra. I usually wear a medium or a large in dresses, so I ordered the XL. It fits perfectly, I am so thrilled! I will be wearing this at a fancy concert. I ordered the sparkly royal blue and it is wonderful! The armholes cover my bra, and the skirt length is to my knees. Note… For Utah girls, it is not midcalf length. The matching tie can be worn around your waist in a side not or even a bow in the back. My daughter said you could even use it in your hair if you'd like since the dress has an empire waist line. This dress also has princess seams on the front and the back that rise up from the waist! This is very flattering for us large busty girls. I will be wearing slip shorts underneath since the fabric is only one layer on the skirt and will show panty lines. You could even purchase a short petticoat to really do the swing/cocktail look. The neckline on this dress for me is a nice rounded neck, not too low if you are dancing and don't want to fall out of the front of your dress! If you have a beautiful necklace pendant, that looks nice against the color you choose for the dress, wear it! I love the cap sleeves too, it should keep you cool if you are dancing. And for those of you who have definition in your arm muscles, you can show them off with this dress! The description of this dress says it has sequins, and if you are thinking those little round plastic notions that are reflective and have to be sewn on with thread, that is incorrect. For those of you who want the sparkly version of this dress, it is a beautiful thread that is used with sparkles in it so it is part of the fabric. you don't have to worry about any plastic sequins falling off. A much more modern version of sparkle. I am impressed with all of the color choices of this dress. The white version could be worn as a wedding dress, and so many pinks for those who love pink! If you are a mother of the bride, please know that this is not a long dress. It is definitely knee length unless you are very short, petite, and choose one of the little bitty sizes. After my concert, I will be coming back for another color for myself and one for my 19-year-old daughter who will be having a birthday soon! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Comfy!
items.body: This dress reminds me of Monets water lilies. More than that is super comfy and easy to slip on and off. It doesn’t wrinkle and is nice and flowy. Runs slightly big. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soiled underwear included in the shipment
items.body: The package arrived on time and all seemed well until it was opened. inside with the item that was ordered was a very soiled female underwear. I'm so disgusted by this that i was not able to fit the dress and may not ever wear it because of the trauma the sight of the very soiled panties is causing Read more
items.author: jackyl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: Nice fit, true to size. It’s not cotton but the material is nice with a slight stretch. Got compliments for this dress. Read more
items.author: Mel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for the price
items.body: Starting out the dress is really cute. Im on the heavier side so it was a little tight but stretched enoughto get into it. THats on me for not ordering a size up. My only complaint is that I wish the waist sash was bigger so I could habe worn it the way the photo presents. On larger bodies it doesnt leave a lot to make a bow with so I ended up having to wear it without it. Also note thay the back zipper is difficult to do on your own so you may need a friend or family member to zip you in Over all very cute dress and got lots of compliments at the wedding I attended. Read more
items.author: Kayla C.

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Cocktail Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Cocktail Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Glitter_black, Glitter_burgundy, Glitter_fuschia, Black Blue White Flower, Black Yellow Flower, Royalblue, Black White Flower, Rose, Blush Flower, Black, Champagne, Glitter_green, Darkgreen, Lavender. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
